original_text: When they went into the tent of the congregation, and when they came near unto the altar, they washed; as the Lord commanded Moses.
korean_text: 그들이 회막에 들어갈 때와 제단에 가까이 갈 때에 씻었으니 여호와께서 모세에게 명령하신 대로 되니라

sentences.original_text: When they went into the tent of the congregation
and when they came near unto the altar
